name: Haiki Gas Circle
storyline:
“It seems that if you have a ticket, someone will come to pick you up.''

At a certain train station, where attempts to prevent accidents have been unsuccesseful and a series of suicides have occurred, the protagonist stands on the platform with a memo in his hand.

"It seems that if you strongly desire something, you will get a ticket, and if you stand with it at this station, the train that will take you to the destination of your dreams will stop.''

"That's just a rumor."
"No, this is a curse."
"No, it's because of the spirits of those who have died."

While listening to the voices of people making various rumors, the protagonist thinks:
"I didn't need to stop at this station to go to school.
I wonder why I came to this station...
But if there really is such a thing as a ticket that makes wishes come true---"

Suddenly, he's struck by ringing in his ears and the area is filled with silence. Before he knew it, the platform was no longer crowded and, along with the sound, even the color was gone. He was alone in this monochrome world.

When he turned his eyes, the train had already stopped before he knew it. While he was stunned, someone pushed his back and he ended up boarding the train.

Then, after leaving a note on the platform, the train starts running.
